Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit reports on clearance rates of index crimes
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the police dept to submit reports on clearance rates of index crimes.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to report on the number of arrests and summonses returnable to the Transit Adjudication Bureau for subway fare evasion
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the police dept to report on the number of arrests and summonses returnable to the Transit Adjudication Bureau for subway fare evasion.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit reports on clearance rates of index crimes

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit reports on clearance rates of index crimes

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit reports on clearance rates of index crimes
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
